task.title: Setting up the Overhead Projector
task.shortdesc: Need to use the overhead projector for a presentation or seminar? We've got you covered.

taskbody.context: How to set up the overhead projector for use.

step.cmd: Turn the projector on by pressing the "Power" button
You should receive a notification of connection on the host computer
Once you are connected, start the projector's "Control Panel" application on your computer
Project your screen onto the whiteboard
Adjust the lens and zoom to appropriate parameters in "Control Panel"
Make sure the resolution is set to 1366x768 pixels for optimal quality in "Control Panel"

taskbody.result: There you have it! By following those instructions, you should be able to set up and start the overhead projector for use.
taskbody.postreq: Make sure to turn off the projector by pressing the "Power" button before leaving the classroom.
